bug.author: manycoding
bug.summary: 404 if notebook root is different from server root directory
bug.description:
Describe the bug If the notebook folder is changed, profile_report() displays 404 To Reproduce In a jupyter notebook: <denchmark-code>%cd -q src import pandas as pd import pandas_profiling pd.DataFrame(["a", "b"], columns=["a"]).profile_report() </denchmark-code>
Version information: pandas-profiling 2.0.3

comments.comment: Great find. The next version will use srcdoc instead of src on the iframe. This way there is no dependency on the current path. For future reference, this should work: %cd -q ../ import pandas as pd import pandas_profiling pd.DataFrame(["a", "b"], columns=["a"]).profile_report(style={'full_width':True})
